column15: effect=Allows the player to purchase [[rescue team camp]]s from Wigglytuff's Camp Corner while in a [[mystery dungeon]]. Summons Wigglytuff as a partner if all camps have been bought.

column1: The partner Wigglytuff has the following properties:

column2: it cannot be revived. If an enemy Pokémon defeats it
column3: it does not get the Awakened status.
